network_overview: A single Diameter/TCP flow (4 packets, 3 s) between two EPC nodes carrying command 8388636; the request is answered with Result-Code 3002, indicating a permanent failure. No voice, media, or additional signaling is captured.

observations.finding: Exactly one Diameter request/response pair; 324-byte average packet size is typical for AVP-heavy EPC messages.
observations.evidence: Cmd-8388636 request (frame 1) and answer with Result-Code 3002 (frame 3)

observations.finding: 100 % failure rate for Cmd-8388636; every attempt received Result-Code 3002.

root_causes.description: The responder (10.47.73.86) returned permanent failure 3002 for command 8388636, causing the procedure to abort.
root_causes.impact: Prevents successful completion of the Diameter procedure (likely S6a/S13/Cx depending on deployed command code).

inconclusive_aspects.reason: Command name and Application-ID not provided in capture metadata
inconclusive_aspects.additional_capture_needed: Diameter decode with full AVP list to reveal Command Code and Application-ID

inconclusive_aspects.reason: No GTP-U, RTP, or SIP messages observed
inconclusive_aspects.additional_capture_needed: Parallel user-plane capture on S1-U or SGi

recommendations.action: Investigate the meaning of Result-Code 3002 for command 8388636 in the relevant 3GPP specification (S6a/S13/Cx/etc.) and check responder logs for the exact failure reason.
recommendations.rationale: The capture proves a permanent Diameter failure; vendor documentation or logs will translate 3002 into actionable detail.

session_analysis.signaling_health: Single Diameter transaction failed with permanent error 3002; no retry or alternate procedure observed.
session_analysis.user_plane_health: Not observable at this capture point.
session_analysis.voice_quality: Media plane not captured at this observation point.
session_analysis.cross_plane_correlation: No user-plane traffic present to correlate with the failed Diameter exchange.

sequence_diagram:
sequenceDiagram

    participant B as 10.47.73.86
